p: Two proportions were compared using the Standardized Normal Deviate test and differences together with their 95% CIs were reported. The durations of antibiotic treatment were compared using Student's t test and mean differences with 95% CIs of the mean difference were reported. All the analyses were performed following the intention-to-treat principle using the IMB SPSS Statistics version 25 (IBM Corp., Armonk, NY, USA) and StatsDirect version 3.1.14 (StatsDirect Ltd, Birkenhead, UK) statistical programs.
